title: ResponsiveAds SW Developer (Front End)
explanation: The candidate has experience in web app development and is proficient in Python, which could be transferable to this role, but lacks specific experience with Svelte, React, and CSS3.

title: Director of People
explanation: The candidate has leadership and communication skills, but lacks the specific HR experience and knowledge of labor laws required for this role.

title: HR & Talent Acquisition Specialist
explanation: The candidate has strong communication and organizational skills, but lacks specific experience in HR and talent acquisition.

title: Senior People Operations Specialist
explanation: The candidate has experience in managing and leading individuals, which could be transferable to this role, but lacks specific experience in HR management and knowledge of labor laws.

title: Manager, Finance, Planning and Analysis (FP&A)
explanation: The candidate does not have a background in Finance or Accounting, nor experience in Financial Planning & Analysis, which are essential for this role.

title: Senior Strong DevOps Engineer
explanation: The candidate does not have the required experience in DevOps, Kubernetes, Cassandra DB, or any cloud providers, which are crucial for this role.

title: Lead Product Designer
explanation: The candidate does not have the required experience in product design or user experience design, which are crucial for this role.
